## CronJobOptions type

Options for a cron job. It adds an optional `name` to cron parameters.

[cron configuration](https://github.com/kelektiv/node-cron#api)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type CronJobOptions = CronJobParameters & {
    name?: string;
};
```
